Woah there, Getthro. Why don't you take a pill? I've only just started doing torrents, so I must've put it under the wrong category. -SORRY- 

But I'm sure you're right, calling people "idiots" and "thick" for making a mistake MUST be the best way to go about things!
and yet you continue to do it with all your uploads this is not the first and it has been commented on before but u still do it.

Actually, I did all of my video uploads at relatively the same time. For some reason, I'm not able to modify my torrents. I messaged TPB Admin about this but still no response. In future, I'll make doubly sure to ensure that I place my torrents in the correct category.

PLEASE NOTE: THIS IS NOT A HIGHRES MOVIE - IT IS A HIGH-QUALITY DVD-RIP. AS SOON AS I FIGURE OUT HOW TO MODIFY MY TORRENTS, I'LL PLACE IT IN THE CORRECT CATEGORY. I APOLOGIZE IN ADVANCE FOR ANY INCONVENIENCE.
